title: Help! I've lost my font file and cannot remember what font this is.
content:
Hi,

I need to do some banner work for my website and I lost the font when transferring computers. (I forgot to back up fonts, silly me.)

Can anybody help me find out what font this is?

| --- | --- |
| [photo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417162201/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_37.jpg) | 266.38 KB |
author: RJD

comments.content:
This is a font ID question. Please ask in the ID section.
